name: Adjudicator

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ACC in all battles by 40

skills.name: Isolation Cell
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a 50% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]

skills.name: Slowing Sanction
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of decreasing the Turn Meter by 20%.
Damage based on: [ATK]

skills.name: Penalize
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 2 times at random. Has a 50% chance of increasing the cooldown of one of the target's Skills by 1 turn at random.
Damage based on: [ATK]

faction.default_description: High Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 28 champions

seo.description: High Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 25 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: High Elves originate from Aravia where they have built a wondrous, shimmering city. Living in these lands of plenty has enabled them to evolve their society to the highest degree of physical, intellectual, and spiritual achievement. High-principled, they welcome exiles and offer them new homes further east.

seo.description: Adjudicator is a rare attack champion from the faction High Elves doing magic damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
